at a common price.

constructor.details: The _cardPrice should be per fraction of a card

params._arcadeumCoinAddr: The address of the ERC-1155 Base Token
params._arcadeumCoinID: The ID of the ERC-1155 Base Token
params._factoryManagerAddr: The address of the Skyweaver Factory Manager contract

params._ids: Array of card IDs to make non-purchasable

getPurchasableStatus(uint256[]).return: The purchasable status of card IDs provided

onERC1155Received(address,address,uint25.details: `_data` must be encoded as follow: abi.encode(Order)

params._from: The address which previously owned the Token

registerIDs(uint256[]).details: Next version should pack isPurchasable to reduce SLOADs cost     for bulk purchases

params._ids: Array of asset IDs to allow for purchasing

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: This function MUST return true if it implements the ERC1155TokenReceiver interface and ERC-165 interface.     This function MUST NOT consume more than 5,000 gas.

params.interfaceID: The ERC-165 interface ID that is queried for support.s

supportsInterface(bytes4).return: Wheter ERC-165 or ERC1155TokenReceiver interfaces are supported.

updateCardPrice(uint256).details: Don't forget to account for the decimals

params._recipient: Address where the currency will be sent to
